home.description: Home sweet home! No matter what life throws at you, you know that at least your house is there for you- even though it's an inanimate object.

bed.description: Lying on your bed, you feel all your worries slip away. After an hour or so, though, you force yourself to get up and be productive. The rent isn't gonna pay itself!

explore home.description: Your home is a giant eyesore. Items are scattered chaotically around the floor, and last time you checked there was an anthill next to the door. Maybe this is why you have no friends.

south street.description:
You look around and see the houses of various townspeople and adventurers.
To the west lies a bridge leading to the Enchanted Forest.
To the southwest is a passage way leading out of the town.
To the southeast is a locked gate blocking the entrance to an open plateau.
To the east is the bar famous for its games and cocktails.
You can also go to the north side of the town.

north street.description:
You head north.
To the west, there are a few shops open for trading.
You also see a wooden boat floating on the river.
To the north, there is a bridge leading to the ocean.
To the east, there's a passage way between the trees leading to who knows where.

shop.description: You make it to the crowded marketplace and find yourself immediately squished between two vendors offering you apples. After getting them off your back, you make it to the portion reserved for adventurers.

boat.description: This is a public wooden boat used mostly for fishing. It's pretty old, but still looks new and undamaged. Maybe you can do some fishing?

bar.description: You entered Sammy's Bar, the best (and only) bar in town! It's famous for its explosive cocktails and mini-casino (You must be 18 or older to play. Please play responsibly).

enchanted forest.description: This is an ancient forest teeming with magic. Many adventurers have attempted to explore here, but had given up partway through due to its mysterious, unpredictable, and dangerous environment. Legends say that this area contains a mythical power inside a holy shrine, but no one has ever seen it.

cemetery.description: Walking through the passage, you find yourself in a cemetery. You recall that this place is a terrifying path to the underworld filled with members of the undead.

boss raid.description: You walk up to a monstrous, fiery gate that towers over you. The withered skulls of less fortunate adventurers adorn the gateposts. What could possibly be behind it?

easter egg.description: You have been teleported to an Easter Egg location! Please pay attention to what you do next, as there's no guarantee you will ever be brought here again!
